records.location_details: The incident occurred during screening activities on shore at Cala Pañon Cortado, Cuevas del Almanzora, Almería, Spain, involving a group of 17 Algerian migrants.
records.where_clear: Cala Pañon Cortado, Cuevas del Almanzora, Almería, Spain
records.location_text_raw: on shore at Cala Pañon Cortado, Cuevas del Almanzora (Almería)
records.geocodable_query: Cala Pañon Cortado, Cuevas del Almanzora, Almería, Spain

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman and degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 4 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union

records.context_note: A migrant reported being slapped, hit/pushed, and forced to carry a box by a Spanish officer during screening activities on shore in Almería. The Fundamental Rights Office finds it unclear if the ill-treatment occurred, as the migrant had no visible injuries and declined medical assistance.
records.evidence_quote: a migrant reported having been slapped in the face, hit/pushed in the stomach and pushed in the back by a Spanish officer.
